preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 400 grams of copper using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 100 grams of gallium. 
 3. Measure 100 grams of samarium. 
 4. Combine all three materials in a clean, dry crucible. 
 5. Stir the mixture thoroughly to ensure even distribution of the metals.
